name: 許嘉裕
objective: 本課程介紹作業研究中非線性模式之各項基本概念及應用，包含運輸模型、網路模式、整數規劃、動態規劃、決策分析與等候原理等。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Holiday
Week 3-Week 4: Transportation and Assignment Problem
Week 5-Week 6: Network Optimization Models
Week 7: Holiday
Week 8: Integer Programming
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10-Week 11: Non-linear programming
Week 12-Week 13: Dynamic Programming
Week 14-Week 15: Decision Analysis
Week 16-Week 17: Queueing Theory 
Week 18: Final Exam
materials: 廖慶榮，2009，作業研究，2版，華泰文化，台北。
